SELECT ua.user_address_id AS shippingId, ua.user_id AS userId, ua.recipient_name AS recipientName, ua.phone_number AS recipientPhone, ua.address_line1 || ' ' || ua.address_line2 AS recipientAddress, ua.postal AS postalCode, ua.is_default AS isDefault FROM user_addresses ua
WHERE ua.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ua.is_default DESC, ua.user_address_id ASC
